custom_server_script:
data.user = frappe.session.user


data.user_info = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT C.name FROM `tabCustomer` C INNER JOIN `tabPortal User` PU ON C.name=PU.parent WHERE PU.user='{frappe.session.user}'""",as_dict=1)
data.user_name = data.user_info[0].get("name") if data.user_info[0] and data.user_info[0].get("name") else ""
data.update({"profile_menu":[{"menu":"My Profile","route":"/profile"},{"menu":"My Order","route":"/order-list"},{"menu":"My Cart","route":"/checkout"},{"menu":"Logout","route":"#"}]})
data.side_menu_list = frappe.get_all("Mobile Menu",fields=["label","icon","route"],order_by="display_order ASC")
data.categories = frappe.db.get_all("Item Group",fields=["name as category","route"], filters={"parent_item_group":"All Item Groups","show_in_website":1},order_by="creation")
data.cart_count = 0
if frappe.session.user!="Guest":
    if frappe.db.get_all("Quotation",filters={"party_name":data.user_info[0]["name"],"order_type":"Shopping Cart","status":"draft"}):
        quotation = frappe.get_doc("Quotation",{"party_name":data.user_info[0]["name"],"order_type":"Shopping Cart","status":"draft"})
        data.cart_count = int((sum(q_item.get('qty') for q_item in quotation.items)) if quotation.items else 0)
if data.categories and len(data.categories) > 0:
    for cat in data.categories:
        cat.route = '/products/'+cat.route
        cat["child"] = frappe.db.get_all("Item Group",fields=["name as category","route"], filters={"parent_item_group":cat.category,"show_in_website":1},order_by="creation")
        if frappe.form_dict.category == cat.route:
            cat["active"] = True
        if cat["child"]:
            for ca_child in cat["child"]:
                ca_child.route = '/products/'+ca_child.route
                ca_child["child_data"] = frappe.db.get_all("Item Group",fields=["name as category","route"], filters={"parent_item_group":ca_child.category,"show_in_website":1},order_by="creation")
                for s_ca_child in ca_child["child_data"]:
                    s_ca_child.route = '/products/'+s_ca_child.route
                

# Footer
data.update({"productandservices":[{"name":"Products"},{"name":"Services"},{"name":"Appliances"},{"name":"Storage"},{"name":"Lifestyle"}]})
data.update({"shopnow":[{"name":"Modular kitchen"},{"name":"Tiles"},{"name":"Lighting"},{"name":"Hardware"},{"name":"wooden material"}]})
data.update({"support":[{"name":"Contact"},{"name":"Email Support"},{"name":"Live Chat"},{"name":"Phone Support"},{"name":"Community"}]})
data.update({"about":[{"name":"Company Info"},{"name":"Brand Guidelines"},{"name":"Careers"},{"name":"Investors"},{"name":"About Us"}]})

data.update({"phone_icon":"/files/call 2.svg"})
data.update({"mail_icon":"/files/icons8-mail-96.png"})
data.bottom_menu = [{"menu":"Home","route":"/","icon":"/files/Home.svg","active_icon":"/files/Home-f.svg"},
                    {"menu":"Category","route":"/categories","icon":"/files/Category.svg","active_icon":"/files/Category-f.svg"},
                    {"menu":"Cart","route":"/cart","icon":"/files/cart13934f.svg","active_icon":"/files/Cart-f.svg.svg"},
                    {"menu":"Account","route":"/account","icon":"/files/User.svg","active_icon":"/files/User Filled.svg"}]
data.account_info = [{"menu":"Dashboard","route":"/dashboard","icon":"/files/Category.svg"},
                    {"menu":"My Profile","route":"/profile","icon":"/files/profilebd49af.svg"},
                    {"menu":"Orders","route":"/order-list","icon":"/files/Category.svg"},
                    {"menu":"My Cart","route":"/cart","icon":"/files/cart13934f.svg"},
                    {"menu":"My Wishlist","route":"/wishlist","icon":"/files/header-wishlist.svg"},
                    {"menu":"My Address","route":"/address-list","icon":"/files/profilebd49af.svg"}]
                    
data.update({"footer_icon":[{"icon":"/files/icons8-fb-480.png"},{"icon":"/files/icons8-instagram-240.png"},
{"icon":"/files/icons8-twitterx-500.png"},{"icon":"/files/icons8-linkedin-480.png"}]})
settings = frappe.get_doc('Webshop Settings').as_dict()
data.update({"web_shop_settings":settings})
